EmailTemplate.description: More information in order to get the EGPWS notification
EmailTemplate.name: EGPWS Email Notification Information
EmailTemplate.subject: Terrain Database Notification Information{!Case.Subject} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest on EGPWS Terrain database. In order to sign or unsubscribe to the EGPWS notifications please complete the following steps.
· Please login to our webpage https://ads.honeywell.com/.
· Click on My Account on the top right hand side.
· Under MyAerospace Notification, click on Manage EGPWS Database Notification.
· If you wish to sign to the EGPWS notification, please select the EGPWS models that you want to receive the email notification on new releases.
· If you wish to unsubscribe to the EGPWS notification, please unselect the EGPWS models that you don’t wish to receive the email notification on new releases.
Attached you will find the instructions on how to subscribe to the EGPWS notifications.
Please let us know If you require any additional assistance.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Account Management Representative(AMR)
Honeywell Aerospace
